Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is spotted with a brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of a number of lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394718) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394718)
